resources.string:
Please read this notice calmly
 
The dark mode in this App is only to switch a UI state of the Android system 
The display in the dark mode requires the application to adapt itself (the system interface is the same) 
It is not related to this App whether other applications adapt or not and the situation of their adaptation
 
This App has the following work modes 
1.Normal mode：The availability of it is determined by the system 
2.Compatible mode：requires ADB authorization 
3.Root mode
 
Some devices may be automatically turned off dark mode by the system when turning on dark mode.Only then need to turn on Steady switch dark mode
 
Android 10 and above can attempts to switch force dark with Root. 
This App provides tiles, widgets, static shortcuts,pinned shortcuts and setting assistant applications to quickly switch.
It is not the problem of this App that the system interface or other applications do not turn dark after using this App to turn on dark mode
Some applications set restrictions on the dark mode of the following system for different devices
It is their adaptation problem that their interface is not darken or abnormal
Turn on Steady switch dark mode

In general, Steady switch dark mode does not need to be turned on. It only needs to be turned on when the dark mode is turned on and automatically turned off by the system.\n\nEach time you switch dark mode, click \" Refresh\" in the menu to update the theme of this App.
%1$s Success\n\nReboot the device to take effect
%1$s Success\n\nReboot the device and enable car mode to take effect
Reboot the device to take effect
The current system cannot use %1$s mode is unavailable!Please try other mode
Please grant Root permission or grant permissions using\n%1$s\nIt has been copied to the clipboard
Please grant permissions using\n%1$s\nIt has been copied to the clipboard
Allow tracking bugs through network for optimization and improvement
Not displayed in the recent app list after exiting the app

Switch the dark mode of Android system and some system displays conveniently,Support Android 4.1+.\nXposed function is also provided (can remove the restrictions of some applications on dark mode related functions, currently supports QQ, WeChat and Coolapk by default)
Comply to “Convention of Green Apps for Android”
Provide multiple installers to install APK and uninstall apps silently without root or using root
Removed the restrictions on the dark mode of the following system in some applications.\nSupports Coolapk,Play QQ(8.2.9),QQ(8.3.6) and Wechat(7.0.15) currently.(Support custom configuration).
Click to update time according to sunrise and sunset
Need to allow access to location information

The reason why you see this dialog is that you have not confirmed \"No longer prompt\" in the \"Instructions before use\".\n\nPlease confirm again: the dark mode must apply its own adaptation, otherwise the application will not change after switching which is considered \"invalid\" by some users
Cannot switch Battery Saver at this time
Hello, stranger.This sentence was written on 2020.5.7. You found me, haha. Please enjoy your life and live well!
Switch system theme synchronously when switching the dark mode（need Root）
Use colorful theme when turning off dark mode
